In Scrutinizing Trump and His Allies, Ja.ai_text:
In scrutinizing Trump and his allies,
Jan. 6 panel adopts prosecution tactics;

Focusing on Russian interference,
And possible collusion with the Trump team.

In scrutinizing Trump and his allies,
Jan. 6 panel adopts prosecution tactics;

Drawing lines between right and wrong,
And speaking for the people long silent.

The Housing Situation Is Dire. But Progr.ai_text:
It doesn't have to be this way,
There is still some progress possible;

If we all try to work together
We can turn this dire situation around.

It's no secret, the housing situation is dire
But we must remember, progress is still possible
We must come together, to find a better way
We can't let things stay the same, we can't be complacent

Our future depends on it, we cannot give in
So let's get to work, and build a better world

\u2018Sleep No More\u2019 Awakens After.ai_text:
Sleep no more, my darlings, 
 awaken from your slumber;

The time has come to rise, 
 venture forth into the world.

For too long you have slept, 
 lost in reverie and dreams;

But now the time has come 
 to live your lives anew.

Sleep no more! Awaken from your slumber, 
 See what has become of the world outside; 
The devastation, the destruction, 
The monsters that now rule the land.

Come, let us join together and fight 
This evil that has taken hold; 
Let us show them that we will not be slaves, 
That we will never give in.

50 Years Later, the Rothko Chapel Meets.ai_text:
Not as I hoped, no light shone, the walls were gray

In the glow of the dark, and the room was plain;

The music that flowed from the radio

The room like a pool when a fountain's gone--

The Best and Worst Moments of the 2022 E.ai_text:
The best were moments where the nominees 
Were not expected to win — like
"Meek's Cutoff" won for best actor,
In the presence of Johnny Depp.

In New York City, Pandemic Job Losses Li.ai_text:
The snow and the winds, the sun in the sky,
Laughed with the joy of New York's sigh.

The streets were alive, and there were a few
In the stores and the parks at four.

Men went off to work and there was no need
To tell them about what was to be done.

All of Aaron Judge\u2019s Homers, From 1.ai_text:
“…‘I like to be around the people. The people I like to be around, the happiest memories I have from my days in the Show World, are the days we got to the World Series. I remember in 2008 we came to Shea Stadium, and we had our fans there as well.’
‘I remember Shea Stadium. That’s one of the most special ones I remember, and the feeling when you get a first. We had the first one at Citi Field too. And, you can say that one of the most special events was in 2008 at Wrigley Field. I remember the feeling of walking out on that field, and knowing we were going back to the World Series, and it’s just one of the most special days I had.’
‘I remember 2009 in Atlanta, and I love to play in front of my family and see my friends, and they’re always there.

The English-German dictionary, 
It’s long been growing old;

And we shall now never know, 
For ever it’s in the mold,

The secret things which are not 
Concealed within the page.

You may have missed the other one you wrote, but I think I can make it easier for you.

How a Spreader of Voter Fraud Conspiracy.ai_text:
He stood above his father, and his father stood above
His mother, but he stood above all other men.

He stood above them all with his spreader of voter
Fraud conspiracy theories; and he didn³t understand.

In fact he didn³t like them either. He thought
Their questions were stupid, and their answers dumb.

He hated them all when they asked him where he lived
And he lied, as he told them, ³I don³t live anywhere.´

He hated them anyway for their spreader of voter
Fraud conspiracy theories; and all day long he spied.

His fingers spread and they spread their fingers too,
But the spreader of voter fraud conspiracy theories spread far and wide,

And his lips were so large and his eyes were so blue and bright,
He spread them and spread his spreader even wider each bright day.

Where they were ordered to be served.

-.ai_text:
It grows where the grass lies so fair
For the wind to play on its face

And the sun to light its hair like fire;
It grows from the earth, in spring rain,
The flower that is like the sky.

N.F.L. Week 3 Predictions: Our Picks Aga.ai_text:
I'm predicting I will play this week,
Prediction or no prediction, I'll win;
If you were to ask me why, I'd tell you
"I've got the best of the money, I do."

ai_text:
How can a word make up, or take away,
A living breath or the last drop of sleep?

To what use is it? All that it is is
In the hand for it to lie in the palm:
It would only, like a fly, be seen
Just when a thing was to be undone.
